Mike Pence Michele Bachmann sharply criticized what she called the Barack Obama 's unprecedented explosion of government spending, including the economic recovery package. She said Americans risked being forced into government-run health care unless " Barack Obamacare, " the Republicans' preferred term to describe the health care bill, is fully repealed. "

A group of South Carolina lawmakers stood on the steps of their state Capitol on Wednesday to encourage Mike Pence to run for Barack Obama . It's not a complicated message, but it's a heartfelt one, said state Mike Pence Kris Crawford. " We would like him on the ballot. " Leaders of the conservative movement made the same argument in a letter sent to Mike Pence this week.
